title: Norovirus hospital cases reach highest level ever
content: More than 1,100 patients a day ill in hospital with vomitting bug last week in England.
contentSnippet: More than 1,100 patients a day ill in hospital with vomitting bug last week in England.

title: New graves mark lost generation in drugs-ravaged Scottish town
content: In just a year and a half, at least eight victims of drug misuse have been buried in Oban's Pennyfuir cemetery.
contentSnippet: In just a year and a half, at least eight victims of drug misuse have been buried in Oban's Pennyfuir cemetery.

title: 'My eye was saved by a placenta after acid attack'
content: Newcastle doctors use donated tissue to help save Paul Laskey's eyesight.
contentSnippet: Newcastle doctors use donated tissue to help save Paul Laskey's eyesight.

title: Cancer patients not getting right treatment, say doctors
content: Experts highlight particular problems with prostate, kidney and colon cancer in England and Wales.
contentSnippet: Experts highlight particular problems with prostate, kidney and colon cancer in England and Wales.

title: 'I discovered my fat build-up condition after a Love Islander had it'
content: Emma found out she had a little-known condition and "wasn't obese" after watching a reality show.
contentSnippet: Emma found out she had a little-known condition and "wasn't obese" after watching a reality show.

title: 'There could be no NHS dentists in two years'
content: Dentists say NHS contracts are becoming more challenging to fulfil and they need to hand them back.
contentSnippet: Dentists say NHS contracts are becoming more challenging to fulfil and they need to hand them back.

title: Pledge of two million extra NHS appointments met, PM says
content: Sir Keir Starmer says the figure is a "shot in the arm", but "the job isn't done" to bring down waiting lists.
contentSnippet: Sir Keir Starmer says the figure is a "shot in the arm", but "the job isn't done" to bring down waiting lists.

title: Are noise-cancelling headphones to blame for young people's hearing problems?
content: More young people are presenting to audiology teams in England with difficulty processing sound.
contentSnippet: More young people are presenting to audiology teams in England with difficulty processing sound.

title: Mum's 20-year fight for epilepsy drug compensation
content: Catherine Cox is certain taking valproate while pregnant caused her son's disabilities.
contentSnippet: Catherine Cox is certain taking valproate while pregnant caused her son's disabilities.

title: Clive Myrie: What I saw during my 24 hours at a London hospital
content: As part of the BBC's special report, Clive Myrie meets the people at the Royal Free Hospital relying on the NHS for care.
contentSnippet: As part of the BBC's special report, Clive Myrie meets the people at the Royal Free Hospital relying on the NHS for care.

title: UK men and women can expect to live longer, data show
content: Boys born in the UK in 2023 can expect to live on average to 86.7 years, and girls to 90, experts suggest.
contentSnippet: Boys born in the UK in 2023 can expect to live on average to 86.7 years, and girls to 90, experts suggest.

title: Surgeon suspended after children hurt by treatment
content: An NHS chief exec apologises "unreservedly to our patients and their families".
contentSnippet: An NHS chief exec apologises "unreservedly to our patients and their families".

title: NHS 'recovery plan' fails to deliver new dentists or more appointments
content: NHS leaders say the contract for dentists to carry out NHS work needs redrawing.
contentSnippet: NHS leaders say the contract for dentists to carry out NHS work needs redrawing.

title: Fifty countries affected by USAID freeze, says WHO
content: HIV treatments and other services have been disrupted, says Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus.
contentSnippet: HIV treatments and other services have been disrupted, says Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus.

title: How much is the NHS going to cost us?
content: Spending on the NHS has been going up for decades and is set to rise further. BBC Verify has examined some of the key numbers.
contentSnippet: Spending on the NHS has been going up for decades and is set to rise further. BBC Verify has examined some of the key numbers.

title: Beware ill-fitting menstrual cups, warn doctors
content: Doctors have reported a rare case where the use of a menstrual cup was linked to kidney problems.
contentSnippet: Doctors have reported a rare case where the use of a menstrual cup was linked to kidney problems.

title: Vitamin pills and icy swims: Can you really boost your immune system?
content: After being struck down by winter illness, the BBC's James Gallagher goes in search of ways to boost his immune system.
contentSnippet: After being struck down by winter illness, the BBC's James Gallagher goes in search of ways to boost his immune system.

title: Photos show 'crumbling', abandoned hospital rooms
content: Nottingham's hospitals were due to be upgraded but a government rebuilding programme was delayed.
contentSnippet: Nottingham's hospitals were due to be upgraded but a government rebuilding programme was delayed.

title: Mesh victims still wait for financial compensation
content: A year after a major report called for urgent action, no scheme has been put in place to help victims.
contentSnippet: A year after a major report called for urgent action, no scheme has been put in place to help victims.

title: 'Suicide website users encouraged our teen son to drink poison'
content: Reeling from Vladimir's death, his family reveal the harrowing risks of a website obsessed with dying.
contentSnippet: Reeling from Vladimir's death, his family reveal the harrowing risks of a website obsessed with dying.

title: Women with endometriosis earn less, research shows
content: Researchers suggest that following diagnosis, women may take lower-paid jobs or work fewer hours.
contentSnippet: Researchers suggest that following diagnosis, women may take lower-paid jobs or work fewer hours.

title: NHS review into killer's care finds major failings
content: Valdo Calocane was given a hospital order for killing Ian Coates, Barnaby Webber and Grace O'Malley-Kumar in 2023.
contentSnippet: Valdo Calocane was given a hospital order for killing Ian Coates, Barnaby Webber and Grace O'Malley-Kumar in 2023.

title: Celebrity butt-lift injector who left women with sepsis exposed by BBC
content: Ricky Sawyer gave out medication illegally and some of his clients needed emergency hospital treatment.
contentSnippet: Ricky Sawyer gave out medication illegally and some of his clients needed emergency hospital treatment.

title: Vaping clinic for children begins seeing patients
content: The service in Alder Hey Childrens' Hospital aims to get 11 to 16-year-olds "nicotine free".
contentSnippet: The service in Alder Hey Childrens' Hospital aims to get 11 to 16-year-olds "nicotine free".

title: Sewage leaks and ops delayed - life at hospitals awaiting rebuild
content: A host of hospital building projects have been put back to the 2030s. How will they cope?
contentSnippet: A host of hospital building projects have been put back to the 2030s. How will they cope?
